radiographic_examinations.findings: The lung bases are clear aside from dependent atelectasis. The liver enhances homogeneously without focal lesions. There is mild periportal edema. The pancreas is diffusely slightly enlarged. The gallbladder is unremarkable, and the portal vein is patent. The CBD is mildly prominent, measuring 6 mm. The kidneys present symmetric nephrograms without solid or cystic lesions or hydronephrosis. The stomach and small bowel are unremarkable. There is mild fecal loading. No abdominal free air or free fluid is noted.
